page.title: 12 Wideopen Middle School
page.content: The Middle School opened in 1969. Mr. Wilks,head for 13 yrs to 1982, taught R.E. & Maths & was interested in sport,especially football.He enjoyed every minute he was here but would not like to come back now.A parent said the Wideopen M.S.,built as a Secondary Modern, took 2 yrs to complete on the site of a rubbish tip.Each class had a small garden.Swim.Baths were built later.Mrs Walters who taught Remedial Eng.and French until 1982,thought the school was quieter now with better displays. Assemblies were also different.She remembered a girl was decapitated while playing on the trains on the mineral line,now closed. Dinners.There are 14 cooks who workfrom 7.50 to 3.30 to prepare,serve and clear up the dinners,and 6 dinner nannies who change duties daily.They enjoy the work because the children are friendly.
